metrics.name: Total Orders
metrics.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE order_date >= DATEADD(day, -7, GETDATE())

metrics.name: Open Orders
metrics.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE completed = 'N'

metrics.name: Open Orders 2
metrics.query: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.completed = 'N'

metrics.name: Daily Revenue
metrics.query: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE CONVERT(date, h.order_date) = CONVERT(date, DATEADD(day, -1, GETDATE()))

metrics.name: Open Invoices
metrics.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.invoice_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE invoice_date >= DATEADD(month, -1, GETDATE())

metrics.name: Orders Backlogged
metrics.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE completed = 'N' AND order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())

metrics.name: Total Monthly Sales
metrics.query: SELECT ISNULL(SUM(l.extended_price), 0) as value FROM dbo.oe_hdr h WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.oe_line l WITH (NOLOCK) ON h.order_no = l.order_no WHERE h.order_date >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE())
